com.jmex.physics
Class StaticPhysicsNode

java.lang.Object
  com.jme.scene.SceneElement
      com.jme.scene.Spatial
          com.jme.scene.Node
              com.jmex.physics.PhysicsNode
                  com.jmex.physics.StaticPhysicsNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme.util.export.Savable, java.io.Serializable
public abstract class StaticPhysicsNode
extends PhysicsNode

This PhysicsNode represents a physical entity that cannot be moved or rotated by forces.

PhysicsNodes are created solely by the PhysicsSpace (methods PhysicsSpace.createDynamicNode() and PhysicsSpace.createStaticNode()).

Author:
Irrisor
See Also:
Serialized Form
